ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros Q a p Hz Hcl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros Q a p Hz Hcl. induction p. - destruct Hz. - simpl. destruct Hcl. + apply CombLinear_1; auto. + apply IHp; auto.
